trans-unit.source: To perform the association, the VPC and the private hosted zone must already exist. You can't convert a public hosted zone into a private hosted zone. If you want to associate a VPC from one AWS account with a zone from a another, the AWS account owning the hosted zone must first submit a CreateVPCAssociationAuthorization (using create_vpc_association_authorization() or by other means, such as the AWS console). With that done, the account owning the VPC can then call associate_vpc_with_hosted_zone() to create the association.
trans-unit.target: 要执行关联,VPC和私有托管区必须已经存在。您不能将公共托管区转换为私有托管区。如果您要将一个 AWS 帐户的 VPC 与另一个帐户的区域进行关联,拥有托管区域的 AWS 帐户必须首先提交 CreateVPCAssociationAuthorization(使用 create_vpc_association_authorization()或通过其他方式,如 AWS 控制台)。完成后,拥有VPC的账户就可以调用associate_vpc_with_hosted_zone()来创建关联。

trans-unit.source: To preserve the changes, set commit to False (either as CLI argument, either as state parameter). However, this is recommended to be used only in exceptional cases when there are applied few consecutive states and/or configuration changes. Otherwise the user might forget that the config DB is locked and the candidate config buffer is not cleared/merged in the running config.
trans-unit.target: 要保留更改，请将 commit 设置为 False （作为CLI参数，或者作为state参数）。但是，建议仅在很少使用连续状态和/或配置更改的例外情况下使用此方法。否则，用户可能会忘记配置数据库已锁定并且候选配置缓冲区未在运行的配置中清除/合并。

trans-unit.source: To use pygit2 for GitFS requires a minimum pygit2 version of 0.20.3. pygit2 0.20.3 requires libgit2 0.20.0. pygit2 and libgit2 are developed alongside one another, so it is recommended to keep them both at the same major release to avoid unexpected behavior. For example, pygit2 0.21.x requires libgit2 0.21.x, pygit2 0.22.x will require libgit2 0.22.x, etc.
trans-unit.target: 要在GitFS上使用pygit2，最低pygit2版本必须为0.20.3。pygit2 0.20.3需要libgit2 0.20.0。pygit2和libgit2是彼此并存的，因此建议将它们都保留在相同的主要版本中，以免发生意外行为。例如，pygit2 0.21.x要求libgit2 0.21.x，pygit2 0.22.x要求libgit2 0.22.x，依此类推。

trans-unit.source: To use a file from the minion cache start from the local winrepo root (C:\salt\var\cache\salt\minion\files\base\win\repo-ng). If you have .sls files organized in subdirectories you'll have to denote them with .. For example, if you have a test directory in the winrepo root with a gvim.sls file inside, would target that file like so: test.gvim. Directories can be targeted as well as long as they contain an init.sls inside. For example, if you have a node directory with an init.sls inside, target that like so: node.
trans-unit.target: 要使用Minion缓存中的文件，请从本地Winrepo根目录（ C:\salt\var\cache\salt\minion\files\base\win\repo-ng ）开始。如果您将 .sls 文件组织在子目录中，则必须使用来表示它们 . 。例如，如果您在winrepo根目录中有一个 test 目录，其中包含一个 gvim.sls 文件，则将目标文件 test.gvim ：test.gvim。只要目录中包含 init.sls ，就可以将目录作为目标。例如，如果您的 node 目录中包含 init.sls ，则将其目标定位为： node 。

trans-unit.source: Unless Salt is invoked from the minion using salt-call, the key(s) must be passphraseless. For greater security with passphraseless private keys, see the sshd(8) manpage for information on securing the keypair from the remote side in the authorized_keys file.

trans-unit.source: Unless an absolute path name is specified, the path of these yaml files is assumed to be relative to the directory containing the MakoStack config file. If a path begins with '/', however, it will be treated literally and can be anywhere on the filesystem.
trans-unit.target: 除非指定了绝对路径名，否则将假定这些 yaml 文件的路径相对于包含MakoStack配置文件的目录。但是，如果路径以“ /”开头，则将按字面对待它，并且该路径可以在文件系统上的任何位置。

trans-unit.source: Unless required by applicable law or agreed to in writing, software distributed under the License is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS, WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied. See the License for the specific language governing permissions and limitations under the License.
trans-unit.target: 除非适用法律要求或书面同意,否则根据许可证分发的软件是以 "原样 "为基础分发的,没有任何形式的明示或暗示的保证或条件。请参阅许可证中关于许可证下权限和限制的具体语言。

trans-unit.source: Unlike pkgs, the names parameter cannot specify a version. In addition, it makes a separate call to the package management frontend to install each package, whereas pkgs makes just a single call. It is therefore recommended to use pkgs instead of names to install multiple packages, both for the additional features and the performance improvement that it brings.
trans-unit.target: 与 pkgs 不同， names 参数不能指定版本。此外，它会分别调用软件包管理前端以安装每个软件包，而 pkgs 仅进行单个调用。因此，建议使用 pkgs 而不是 names 来安装多个软件包，以获取更多功能和带来的性能改进。

trans-unit.source: Unlike the rest_cherrypy Webhook, this is only an unauthenticated webhook endpoint. If an authenticated webhook endpoint is needed, use the salt-api webhook which runs on the master and authenticates through eauth.
trans-unit.target: 与 rest_cherrypy Webhook 不同,这只是一个未经认证的 webhook 端点。如果需要一个经过认证的webhook端点,请使用salt-api webhook,它运行在master上,通过eauth进行认证。

For example, if IPMI Messaging is disabled for a user, but that user is enabled for activating the SOL payload type, then IPMI commands associated with SOL and session management, such as Get SOL Configuration Parameters and Close Session are available, but generic IPMI commands such as Get SEL Time are unavailable.) ipmi_msg

You will usually want a bridged network defined by having a

trans-unit.source: Valid for Latency-based resource record sets only. The Amazon EC2 Region where the resource that is specified in this resource record set resides. The resource typically is an AWS resource, such as an EC2 instance or an ELB load balancer, and is referred to by an IP address or a DNS domain name, depending on the record type.
trans-unit.target: 仅对基于延迟的资源记录集有效。此资源记录集中指定的资源所在的 Amazon EC2 区域。该资源通常是 AWS 资源,如 EC2 实例或 ELB 负载平衡器,根据记录类型,用 IP 地址或 DNS 域名来表示。

trans-unit.source: Valid for Weighted resource record sets only. Among resource record sets that have the same combination of DNS name and type, a value that determines the proportion of DNS queries that Amazon Route 53 responds to using the current resource record set. Amazon Route 53 calculates the sum of the weights for the resource record sets that have the same combination of DNS name and type. Amazon Route 53 then responds to queries based on the ratio of a resource's weight to the total.
trans-unit.target: 仅对加权资源记录集有效。在具有相同 DNS 名称和类型组合的资源记录集中,一个确定 Amazon Route 53 使用当前资源记录集响应的 DNS 查询比例的值。Amazon Route 53 会计算具有相同 DNS 名称和类型组合的资源记录集的权重之和。然后,Amazon Route 53 会根据资源权重占总权重的比例来响应查询。

trans-unit.source: Valid for Weighted, Latency, Geolocation, and Failover resource record sets only. An identifier that differentiates among multiple resource record sets that have the same combination of DNS name and type. The value of SetIdentifier must be unique for each resource record set that has the same combination of DNS name and type. Omit SetIdentifier for any other types of record sets.
trans-unit.target: 仅对加权、延迟、地理位置和故障转移资源记录集有效。用于区分具有相同 DNS 名称和类型组合的多个资源记录集的标识符。对于具有相同 DNS 名称和类型组合的每个资源记录集,SetIdentifier 的值必须是唯一的。对于任何其他类型的记录集,省略SetIdentifier。

trans-unit.source: Various functions of the iptables module use the --check option. If the version of iptables on the target system does not include this option, an alternate version of this check will be performed using the output of iptables-save. This may have unintended consequences on legacy releases of iptables.
trans-unit.target: iptables 模块的各种功能使用 --check 选项。如果目标系统上的 iptables 版本不包含此选项，则将使用iptables-save的输出执行此检查的替代版本。这可能会对 iptables 的旧版本产生意想不到的后果。

trans-unit.source: Varstack will then use /etc/varstack.yaml to determine which configuration data to return as pillar information. From there you can take a look at the README of varstack on how this file is evaluated.
trans-unit.target: 然后，Varstack将使用/etc/varstack.yaml确定返回哪些配置数据作为支柱信息。从那里可以查看varstack 的自述文件，以了解如何评估此文件。

trans-unit.source: Varstack will then use /path/to/the/config/file/varstack.yaml (usually /etc/varstack.yaml) to determine which configuration data to return as adapter information. From there you can take a look at the README of varstack to learn how this file is evaluated. The ENC part will just return the 'states' dictionary for the node.
trans-unit.target: 然后，Varstack将使用/path/to/the/config/file/varstack.yaml（通常是/etc/varstack.yaml）来确定将哪些配置数据作为适配器信息返回。在这里，您可以查看varstack 的自述文件，以了解如何评估此文件。ENC部分将仅返回该节点的“状态”字典。
